extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Dead Island on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1250 gamer points.. All 58 Achievements included. This includes the Bloodbath Arena DLC Trophies.. Descriptions for all 58 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when the selected is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Techland, Deep Silver or Square Enix.
